intro: In der Ruhe liegt die Kraft.

post.body: Not really much todo here. I was on ZeroNet perhaps 2 or 3 years ago and many, many people were here. Where are all gone? I hope that some people are still here, haha.

Hmm. I cloned a blog to start a new one. I can edit and save the blog name but I can not edit a new post. After writing a headline I clicked on "save". I see the animation on the save-button but nothing happens. I have waited for 10 minutes. Nothing happened. Does that be a known problem?

Hey, I got it. I could start a new blog with editing and saving. But it is weird.
My first try was to clone the original ZeroBlog. There I was not able to change or edit anything. Nothing worked.
Now I cloned Kaffie's blog and all works fine. I don't know where the problem on cloning the ZeroBlog was but anyway. Now it works.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NvHckGubDgA4861kAKPqkQcFYPwr7ShAp/

comment.body:
It seems to be really silent here. I read some posts and articles about the actual standing of ZeroNet. Many users are missing the developer, nofish. I don't know, what's happened. Three years ago was much to discuss and many users had been here.
But I use also other networks like Freenet and I2P. Both have not many active user at time. Where are all gone? Who knows?
@Kaffie: I see. I also hope that better times are comming back.

@Bonaccolto90: I did so. I tried it now once again. The same problem. I have 73/122 tracker. All should be fine.
I can leave a comment to a post. But I cannot save the post itself.
Just for testing. It is this one: McCallum
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Ft4aWXMiZeBnsiXm8gwm3sjKhBBnzq5Ao/
